item.description:
This is a great park they have walking trails, duck pond, picnic area, rose garden, wild flower garden, Japanese Garden, herb Garden, bell tower and many other great things to see. It will be an all day event so pack a lunch and we can eat in a picnic area before we start exploring. The park is free to get in. Take a look at the web site. http://www.stanleypar...

I hope to see you there



Jenn
item.how_to_find_us: Meeting at the pavilion near the playground
item.name: point and shoot
